mapper.insert: insert into WORDS(id, id_ac, wname, wx, wx2, wften, wften2, autoin, sort, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date) values(#{id}, #{id_ac}, #{wname}, #{wx}, #{wx2}, #{wften}, #{wften2}, #{autoin}, #{sort}, #{remarks}, #{create_by}, #{create_date}, #{update_by}, #{update_date})
